name: Marfa Mini
description: Marfa Mini is a new builder/creator resource center in Marfa Texas dedicated to fostering community, art, and Web3 growth. Funding will be used to cover operating expenses such as rent, hardware such as design stations, and neighborhood events. MM is intended as a proving grounds for deploying Web3 models into multi-use, art shared spaces.
payDisclosure: Marfa Mini aims to build a self-sustaining enterprise... but, that's going to take a while and not guaranteed. Look at our project as an investment in the arts, more than an investment in your portfolio.
